caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. A man is in conversation with several other men who appear to be reporting to him. The man asks a series of questions, and the answers seem to greatly shock him. He displays strong resentment, while the men reporting to him appear helpless. Afterward, there is a scene with a mother and daughter eating, as well as a mother and son having a meal. The child is complaining about something and looks quite frustrated, but the mothers are trying to console him. Later, the child stands up and angrily says something. The girl asks a question, but the child suddenly gets stuck and can't answer. Following this, there is a scene with a young girl eating. She angrily stabs her knife into the table. At that moment, her father enters and engages with her in a friendly conversation.
